section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:

para.text: “Commission” means the Motor Vehicle Theft Prevention Commission established by § 3-1352.
“Fund” means the General Fund of the District of Columbia.
“Motor vehicle” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 50-1501.01(1).

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 19-21 substituted “General Fund of the District of Columbia” for “Motor Vehicle Theft Prevention Fund established by § 3-1356”.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Section 7093 of D.C. Law 17-219 repealed section 11 of D.C. Law 17-197.
